scripts.build: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude root --verbose run build
scripts.prettier: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude root --verbose run prettier
scripts.test: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude root --exclude @objectiv/schema --verbose run test
scripts.test:ci: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude root --exclude @objectiv/schema --verbose run test:ci
scripts.test:coverage: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude root --exclude @objectiv/schema --verbose run test:coverage
scripts.publish: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude root --verbose exec npm publish
